lead_paragraph: Father Romas was appointed pastor of St. Nicholas Greek Orthodox Church in 1987, and took his small congregation to Brooklyn after the church was destroyed during the terror attacks of Sept. 11, 2001.

headline.print_headline: The Rev. John D. Romas Dies at 86;  Led a Greek Church Destroyed on 9/11
headline.main: The Rev. John Romas, Leader of Greek Church at Ground Zero, Dies at 86

snippet: Father Romas was appointed pastor of St. Nicholas Greek Orthodox Church in 1987, and took his small congregation to Brooklyn after the church was destroyed during the terror attacks of Sept. 11, 2001.
abstract: John D Romas, priest for St Nicholas Greek Orthodox Church in Lower Manhattan who led congregation to Brooklyn after church was destroyed by debris from September 11 terror attacks, dies at age 86.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: St Nicholas National Shrine at the World Trade Center (Manhattan, NY)
